ComicInfo.Title: Childish Things; Food Court; Danny Divided
ComicInfo.Summary:
Have you ever wondered where the Bravest Warriors got their super rad weapons? Were they found in a yard sale, was it some prize after a series of training, or was it just a twist of fate and a lot of luck that lead our heroes to their most trusted weapons? Find out the true story in this issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tyson Hesse | 1 | B | Cover B | Kali Fontecchio | 2 | C | Cover C | Laura Knetzger | 3 | D | Cover D | Andrew Greenstone | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:52:24. [CVDB437611]
